ISSUE.TITLE: Unknown Table List Ordering
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to Project 2. Create N tables 3. Randomly update the tables 4. Right click ``Table`` and click ``Table Refresh`` 5. Repeat step 3 - 4. notice that the order of the table is changed **Expected behavior** The table names should be listed alphabetically. Or there should be some options for users to select. **Screenshots** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/139913731-5af4b7e4-216e-43c5-a729-0c7f48585aa5.png) Node: **v12.22.6** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.81.1**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: optimize tab reload on tab switch re #767 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: load tables list in alphabetic order re #737 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
